abstract: Miguel Ángel Pinto Jerez (born July 4, 1983 in Santiago, Chile) is a Chilean football goalkeeper who plays for Mexican club Correcaminos of the Ascenso MX.
comment: Miguel Ángel Pinto Jerez (born July 4, 1983 in Santiago, Chile) is a Chilean football goalkeeper who plays for Mexican club Correcaminos of the Ascenso MX.
